entry.title: Digital Marketing for Metro Sound
entry.content: Metro Sound is an electronic music label run by my uni. I keep the Instagram and Facebook pages fresh with upcoming events and marketing campaigns. I also tend to show up at the events to film.
entry.summary: Metro Sound is an electronic music label run by my uni. I keep the Instagram and Facebook pages fresh with upcoming events and marketing campaigns. I also tend to show up at the events to film.

entry.title: Digital Communications
entry.content: SMS is the past. I help my university communicate using platforms like Freshchat, WhatsApp Business API and Apple Business Chat.
entry.summary: SMS is the past. I help my university communicate using platforms like Freshchat, WhatsApp Business API and Apple Business Chat.

entry.title: Videography
entry.content: You may see me filming some gigs. Most recently I have been documenting Metropolis Blue and Metro Sound events. I also have experience with Final Cut Pro and Premiere Pro.
entry.summary: You may see me filming some gigs. Most recently I have been documenting Metropolis Blue and Metro Sound events. I also have experience with Final Cut Pro and Premiere Pro.

entry.title: Web Development
entry.content: I didn’t use Wix to create this site. Instead I use my knowledge in HTML and CSS to build sites just like this one!
entry.summary: I didn’t use Wix to create this site. Instead I use my knowledge in HTML and CSS to build sites just like this one!

entry.title: Metropolis Blue Launch Party: Showreel
entry.content: Montage video from my university’s first Metropolis Blue event. Shot by myself and Kailan with two DSLR’s and an iPhone. Edited in Premiere.
entry.summary: Montage video from my university’s first Metropolis Blue event. Shot by myself and Kailan with two DSLR’s and an iPhone. Edited in Premiere.

entry.title: Dolly and the Dinosaur - Without (Live at The Rockhouse)

link.title: Dolly and the Dinosaur - Without (Live at The Rockhouse)

entry.content: Live performance edit from an event I ran in 2018 with friends. Multiple camera shots from two GoPro’s and a DSLR. Edited in Final Cut.
entry.summary: Live performance edit from an event I ran in 2018 with friends. Multiple camera shots from two GoPro’s and a DSLR. Edited in Final Cut.
